name: Natsume Iroha (Blue Archive) (Military Uniform)
description:
This is a LoRA to generate Natsume Iroha from Blue Archive.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

  • These images were generated and only tested using AOM2, AOM3 A1, OrangeMix VAE and AnythingV3 VAE.

  • Always add this to the prompt to activate it: natsume iroha

  • It can do portraits, upper body and cowboy shot pretty well at 512x512

  • I suggest generating at 768x768 for higher quality pictures. It's also suggested using this resolution for full body.

All pictures were upscaled using these settings:

  • Upscaler: Fatal-Anime 4x

  • Hires. Steps: 25

  • Denoising Strength: 0.5

  • Upscale by 1.5

Known Issues

  • Sometimes - It will generate two armbands but you can put armband in the prompt to fix that.

  • It will also make different type of sleeves but you can fix this by adding long sleeves. If you want the sleeves to past her wrists, just add sleeves past wrists.

Embeds and LoRAs used

Bad Prompt - Ekune Style LoRA

Follow me on Twitter for updates- https://twitter.com/TrueHeroBang

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
